title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 128-3.14 - Fertilizers

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 128-3.14 - Fertilizers

State Regulations
(a) The requirements of this section shall not apply to the application or storage of fertilizers for: (1)
an agricultural activity performed in compliance with State or Federal law; and
(2)
non-commercial application by an individual on residential premises. (b) No fertilizer activity shall be considered to be a noncomplying regulated activity. (c) Discharge from the washing of fertilizer application equipment into any watercourse, wetland, reservoir, reservoir stem or controlled lake is prohibited. (d) Use of water directly from a reservoir, reservoir stem or controlled lake for fertilizer make-up is prohibited. (e) Use of water directly from a watercourse for fertilizer make-up without the use of an anti-siphon device is prohibited. (f) Open storage of fertilizer is prohibited. Notes
